document_name: Youth Participation in Decision Making and Policy Implementation

outputs.output_descr: The project echoes the priorities of the SPAY 2011-2015 which emphasizes "the need of promoting youth participation in governance and development of civil society" and will be implemented in close collaboration with the Ministry of Youth and Sports of the Republic of Azerbaijan. The project will aim to provide young people with knowledge and skills to identify and advocate for youth-specific outcomes in the state programmes and strategies; to attract more youth to the civil service; and to strengthen young people's capacities to participate at the international fora.

project_descr: Youth Participation in Decision Making and Policy Implementation.
project_title: Youth Participation in Decision Making and Policy Implem
